methods: void disable() Disables the OrientationListener.
void enable() Enables the OrientationListener so it will monitor the sensor and call onOrientationChanged(int) when the device orientation changes.
void onAccuracyChanged(int sensor, int accuracy) Called when the accuracy of a sensor has changed.
abstract void onOrientationChanged(int orientation) Look at onOrientationChanged(int) for method description and usage
void onSensorChanged(int sensor, float[] values) Called when sensor values have changed.
